comment: Honey and vanilla overtake the spicy drinks like it is much older then it is.
Smells good. Taste sweet on palate first and get strong at the end. I like with out ice or soda
Warm, sweet, little to no smoke.
Vanilla spice nice oak hint of honey.  Very nice

甘い匂い Sweety Smell

刺激も少なく飲みやすい。
The lingering honey flavor is a real treat. Very smooth.
First taste is really strong, but then it's really soft and fruity.
One of the fruitiest whiskies I've ever indulged in. Absolutely spectacular. Drank room temperature neat in a Glencairn.
Oaky, honey, small amount of spice, hints of vanilla, light, citrus, pretty smooth,
Lovely smooth sweet scotch. No smokiness, but still some complex bitter notes with a nice sweet finish

Nose of grapes and vanilla, very pleasant and light, with strong fruit smell. Fruit on the taste, with raisins dominating the finish. Delicious and fruity, but not super light with a finish that doesn't leave immediately
Sweet on the nose and insanely comfortable finish. Sort of evaporates in your mouth at the end. Highly drinkable and a great dram
Smooth. Lingering flavors. No harshness. A Favorite!
Delicate. Dried fruits and very nutty palate finish.
Smoke and fruity with a sweet finish
